QuestData.Title: If They're Just Going to Leave Them Lying Around...
QuestData.Description: Father says that a responsible merchant is always keeping an eye out for good deals. I've been trying to look for deals everywhere I go, and I think I've just found one!$b$bThe naga to the west have dozens of statues that they place on the ground where they live. They couldn't possibly need all of them... so I was thinking that we'd take some for ourselves!$b$bFree statues! That's a good deal, right?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 6 Naga Icons from the Southern Savage Coast in the Cape of Stranglethorn.
QuestData.RewardText: These statues are beautiful...$b$bWow, I had no idea the naga were so talented. Thanks, $n!
